info.title: Categories
info.description: Transaction Types and categories of financial movements

/v1/transaction_types.description: An API resource that represents a collection of transaction types

parameters.name: _limit
parameters.description: Set the number of records to be returned

parameters.name: _offset
parameters.description: Position of the reference record, from which the next N records will be returned

parameters.name: _sort
parameters.description: Provides the possibility to sort the values of the list, in ascending and descending directions

ErrorMessage.title: Root Type for ErrorMessage
ErrorMessage.description: Represents an error message for HTTP status codes 4xx and 5xx

message.description: Short text that gives datails about the error

details.description: List of specific and detailed information about the error

example.message: The request is semantically incorrect or fails business validation

details.description: Field value exceeded the maximum allowed number of 5 characters

issue.description: Unique code that identifies the issue

description.description: Short text that describes the error

location.description:
Part of the request where is the field related to the issue. Posible values are:
- path_parameter
- query_parameter
- header
- body

field.description: Request field  related to the issue

value.description: Current value of the field related to the issue

example.description: Field value exceeded the maximum allowed number of 5 characters

TransactionTypeResponseList.description: Represents a list of Transaction Type in the response body
